info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 6:50PM EDT until May 27 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Chesterfield County in central Virginia... South central Goochland County in central Virginia... North central Amelia County in central Virginia... Powhatan County in central Virginia... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 649 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Macon, or near Powhatan, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Macon around 655 PM EDT. Powhatan around 700 PM EDT. Goochland around 710 PM EDT. Sabot and Manakin around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Goodwins Store, Flat Rock, Crozier, Rock Castle, Pilkinton, Jefferson, Maidens, Provost, Irwin and Giles Mill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
